basics.name: Ziyong Ma
basics.label: Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: Undergraduate student at Carnegie Mellon University majoring in Mathematics and Computer Science with research interests in Robotics, Spatial Intelligence and Data Infrastrutre, Machine Learning for Healthcare.

honors: Dean’s List (Spring 2023, Fall 2023, Spring 2024, Fall 2024, Spring 2025)

work.name: WiSE Lab, CMU Computer Science Department
work.summary: Working on OpenFLAME: a large-scale federated localization and mapping system integrating indoor and outdoor 3D maps, 3D tiles, and search infrastructure using multimodal LLMs.
highlights: Built an interactive 3D map platform with CesiumJS and Google 3D Tiles.
Developed a Dockerized 3D tile service with Django for map delivery.
Implemented a multimodal LLM-based search engine for indoor object discovery.

work.name: RoBot Intelligence Group, CMU Robotics Institute
work.summary: Conducting research on world models for soft robots under Prof. Jean Oh and Prof. Jeffrey Ichnowski.
highlights: Collected multiview datasets of soft-finger deformations in 2000+ states.
Reconstructed 3D time-series models using VGGT and neural predictions.

work.name: DROP Lab, CMU Robotics Institute
work.summary: Worked on Video-Generation Environment Representation (VGER) for 3D reconstruction and motion policy generation.
highlights: Integrated video generation with 3D foundation models for single-image reconstruction.
Developed a multi-scale noise framework for motion-consistent environment representation.

work.name: Data Interaction Group, CMU Human-Computer Interaction Institute
work.summary: Developed machine learning systems for healthcare applications under Prof. Adam Perer.
highlights: Co-authored CHI 2025 paper 'Tempo' for collaborative predictive model design.
Built ML components (Dense, LSTM, Transformer) and integrated SHAP-based interpretability.
First-authored ML4H 2025 paper 'TempoQL'—a human-readable query system for EHR data.

work.name: Soterea Automotive Technology Co., Ltd.
work.summary: Worked on deep learning–based driver assistance systems.
highlights: Collected and processed real-world driving data.
Trained and tested danger-detection models to improve driver safety.

projects.name: Distributed Bitcoin Miner
projects.summary: Implemented a distributed Bitcoin mining system using a custom reliable UDP protocol.
highlights: Implemented LSP protocol in Go for fault-tolerant communication.
Built job scheduler with fairness and fault recovery.

projects.name: Cupid Dating App
projects.summary: Developed an AI-powered dating app with chatbot and matching system.

projects.name: Memory Allocator and Proxy Server Projects
projects.summary: Built systems-level projects including a 64-bit memory allocator and concurrent proxy server with LRU caching.
